sentences.sContent: This carton is made of biodegradable plastic.
sentences.sCn: 这盒子是用生物降解塑料做的。

remMethod.val: bio(生物) + degradable(能降解的) → 可由生物降解的

trans.tranOther: materials, chemicals etc that are biodegradable are changed naturally by  bacteria  into substances that do not harm the environment
